name: Balanak (Spring)
description:
Arasbaran is a vast mountainous region in the north of East Azerbaijan province, which extends from the north of Qushadagh Mountain in the south of Ahar to Aras River.
"Balanak", a carpet with a modern design, is a combination of Baranak and Balan carpet and is considered a sincere homage to the art and history of Arasbaran. Balanak is offered in three different colors, each of which is a sign of Arasbaran in different seasons of the year. Combining different symbols of the region and using diverse colors has turned "Balanak" into a modern product with rich historical roots.
Collectors working in the machine-made carpet industry can have an executable file for carpet weaving.
